tool.name: generate_3D_surface_plot
tool.description: Generates a surface plot of a 3D synthetic image.
tool.help:
**Description**
Generates a surface plot from a 3D synthetic image in the form of a PNG file.
-----
**Input**
- A directory of 3D Synthetic Images - View Angle on x-Direction - View Angle on y-Direction - Alpha-Value
-----
**Output**
- A PNG file of the surface plot
-----
**Example**
The 3D surface plot tool displays the following image on the following default parameters:
- 3D Images: demo3D00 (default parameters) - View Angles (x, y): (20, -30) - Alpha-Value: 0.1
.. image:: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/icaoberg/cellorganizer-galaxy-tools/issue85/tools/cellorganizer/images/surface_plot.png :height: 500 :target: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/icaoberg/cellorganizer-galaxy-tools/issue85/tools/cellorganizer/images/surface_plot.png
